name: Shape Escape (itch) (Zerconium Gaming)
description:
Introducing Shape Escape, a simple shape dodging game designed to improved your reaction time and strategic thinking skills in a fast-paced gaming environment. Your primary objective is to avoid the cuboid onslaught and collect power-ups to increase your score by maneuvering and jumping around shapes in the environment.

There are 3 difficulties to test your skill; Easy, Normal and Hard. 

For new players, Easy mode is definitely the go-to so you can learn the basic mechanics and test your limits.

Once you are experienced, try your luck at Normal/Hard where the onslaught becomes more intense with shapes coming from different directions.

Good Luck!
